text: Here's a patch for the 0.20.5 src to work with jdk1.5
creator: stephan.richard@gmx.de
stephan.richard@gmx.de
text:
Created attachment 16708
fop-0.20.5_tiger.patch

Makes fop-0.20.5 work with the tiger.

Created attachment 22850
build.xml file

As per the patch given above, the attached file is created for the Windows environment.
creator: arpitsen@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 22851
PDFGraphics2D.java

As per the patch file given above, the Java file is created for the Windows environment.
creator: arpitsen@gmail.com
jeremias@apache.org
text: We've stopped long ago to maintain the 0.20.5 codebase. Current FOP Trunk compiles just fine on Java 1.5. Please consider upgrading your FOP to 0.95 or later.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
